title: Best ever carrot cake
description: The holy grail of snacks - a healthy cake!

ingredients.details: coarsely grated, plus extra to decorate

instructions: Pre-heat the oven to 170˚C fan oven / 150˚C gas mark 3.
Grease a 22cm spring form cake pan and line the base.
Combine the eggs with the brown sugar and oil in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients except for the icing sugar and cream cheese, then fold in the egg mixture. Spoon into the cake tin.
Cook for 1 hour 40 minutes or until well-risen. To test, insert a skewer into the cake's centre - it should come out clean. If the top gets too brown, cover it with foil.
Leave the cake in the tin for 10 minutes, then remove and leave to cool on a wire rack.
For the icing, beat together the cream cheese and the icing sugar with an electric whisk until smooth. Leave to harden for 30 minutes.
Spread the icing over the cake. If decorating with grated carrot, pat the carrot dry with kitchen paper, then sprinkle over the top.
imageDesc: A slice of carrot cake on a plate, decorated with icing and grated carrot.
